title: Replace
text: goal discernible promote use “discernible” “significant” “statistically”, leave “significant” “practically significant”. package developed somewhat tongue--cheek manner, implement ideas Jeff Witmer’s editorial terminology statistical inference.

title: Replace
text: basic example can use discernible() function:
code: library(discernible)  conclusion <- "The clinical trial showed statistically significant evidence of being effective." discernible(conclusion) #> [1] "The clinical trial showed statistically discernible evidence of being effective."
